reviews.text:
Food is amazing 

I usually order the combo's but the portions are small.  However, love the fried drumsticks.
Once loyal customer.  They see their customers coming with their now pathetically small entre no bigger than a third the size of your rice.  If they showed...

Still going to Wangs on East 5th Avenue.
 Very good food choices.  I stick to my faves from there which is lo mein, crab rangoon and now they're serving...
